name: Trojan Horse
wikiSummary: Bloc Party's 'Trojan Horse' is an energetic mix of an on-going background synth, guitar-driven chorus and a pitch shifting guitar solo to finish it all off. Track 5 off of Bloc Party's third album, Intimacy.
wikiText:
Bloc Party's 'Trojan Horse' is an energetic mix of an on-going background synth, guitar-driven chorus and a pitch shifting guitar solo to finish it all off. Track 5 off of Bloc Party's third album, Intimacy.
